abstract: Is there a better way to get the latest software updates than opening each application, one by one, and clicking “check for updates?”
snippet: Is there a better way to get the latest software updates than opening each application, one by one, and clicking “check for updates?”
lead_paragraph: Q. Is there a better way to get the latest software updates than opening each application, one by one, and clicking “check for updates?” This approach gets rather tedious with 20 applications from 20 different companies.
